title: EVELYNN TEASER OMIGOSH OMIGOSH OMIGOSH OMIGOSH OMIGOSH OMIGOSH

embed.description: Be mesmerized once again by Agony's Embrace

body:
OMIGOSH! OMIGOSH! OMIGOSH! After such a long wait, an Evelynn teaser is finally here :D It sounds soooooooo scary and the voice is amazing  :D Even the art is pretty awesome.

I'm just senselessly gushing at this point (omigosh!) xD

❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ ❤ 

Just have to wait for the abilities, I guess.
{{champion:28}}

replies.body: Hope your champion Is gonna be lit af for you
We put up with Sesh gushing about Azir so I guess you can hush about eve. Only this once though :P

dont worry i was hyped when urgot and yoricks teasers came out.....

now i rarely play them.....{{sticker:sg-janna}}
I hope they make her really good in the jungle and unplayable in lane so certain eve one tricks can learn to play other champions when they get autofilled instead of dodging.
